connection_type.title: Choose Connection Method
connection_type.description: Select how to connect to your Middle Atlantic RackLink PDU. Redfish is recommended for modern devices.

user.title: Connect to Middle Atlantic RackLink PDU
user.description: Set up a Middle Atlantic RackLink PDU to integrate with Home Assistant. {discovered_count} devices were discovered on your network.

data.port: Port (443 for Redfish HTTPS, 80 for Redfish HTTP, 6000 for Telnet, 60000 for Binary protocol)
data.use_https: Use HTTPS (Redfish only - recommended for security)
data.enable_vendor_features: Enable vendor features (load shedding, sequencing) - requires additional Telnet connection

discovery.title: Discovering RackLink Devices
discovery.description: Searching for RackLink PDUs on your network...

zeroconf_confirm.title: Confirm RackLink Device
zeroconf_confirm.description: Found RackLink device: {hostname}. Please confirm the connection details.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device. Please check the IP address, port, and network connectivity.
error.redfish_not_supported: Redfish API is not available on this device. Try using Telnet/Binary protocol instead.
error.invalid_redfish_response: Invalid response from Redfish API. Please check device compatibility.
error.cannot_connect_after_discovery: Failed to connect even after trying to discover the correct port. Please verify the device is a RackLink PDU and control protocol is enabled. For Premium/Select series, try port 6000. For Premium+ series, try port 60000.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password. Please check your credentials. Default username is often 'admin' with device-specific password.
error.invalid_input: Invalid input provided. Please check all fields.
error.not_racklink_device: This device does not appear to be a RackLink PDU.
error.protocol_mismatch: Device found but protocol mismatch. Try different port: 6000 for Telnet (Premium/Select) or 60000 for Binary (Premium+).
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
